name: Magniball
description:
Roll to the end of the stage!
Change your environment!
Get the best time!
GameJam game created in 2 days on AIE campus.

- WASD to move.
- Left Mouse Click to magnify certain pieces of the environment 

Team members:
Brandon Miller - Director and Lead Design
Tessa Touchette - Level Design, Lighting and QA Tester
Byron Boskell - Lead Programmer and QA Tester
John McMahon - Lead Artist and Texture Designer
Dylan Horn - Prop Artist and Marble Design
Tim Greenwood - Environment Artist and Texture Designer
Anton Chew - Level Design and Concept Design

Simple download the 7Zip file, extract and run the 'MagniballGame' build to play.

Have fun! :)
